Bodybuilders burn 400 cl during their exercise. They should at least drink half of a glass water every hour. So Hoosh noosh suggest bodybuilders drink a glass of water based on the given program by the bottle application for 2 hours. Consuming every kc demands drinking 1 cc water so body can continue its metabolize.

Bikers burn 1000 cl during their exercise. They should at least drink half of a glass water every hour. So Hoosh noosh suggest bikers drink a glass of water based on the given program by the bottle application for 2 hours. Consuming every kc demands drinking 1 cc water so body can continue its metabolize.

Runners burn 550 cl during their exercise. They should at least drink half of a glass water every hour. So Hoosh noosh suggest runners drink a glass of water based on the given program by the bottle application for 2 hours. Consuming every kc demands drinking 1 cc water so body can continue its metabolize.
